description: This table stores instants and other discrete data values associated with event timings for received encounters.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: TIMINGS_SINGLE_SOURCE_ORG_ID
columns.description: Source organization for timings with a single source.

columns.name: TIMINGS_SINGLE_SOURCE_ORG_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.
